price: que corrompen la Tierra y no contribuyen al establecimiento del bienestar".
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ يُفۡسِدُونَ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَلَا يُصۡلِحُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: alladhīna yuf'sidūna fī al-arḍi walā yuṣ'liḥūna
